transArray.content: The breakfast was very good. I will choose All Seasons Hotel next time. I usually choose hotels under Huazhu when traveling. Personally, I prefer Orange and All Seasons Hotels. The sanitary facilities are simple, fashionable, convenient, and warm.

Thank you very much for your praise and thank you for your continued recognition and support of the hotel and our work. We will continue to work hard and will not let you down. We look forward to your frequent stays!
